get-stdin

Easier stdin

Install 

$ npm install --save get-stdin

Usage 

// example.js
var stdin = require('get-stdin');

stdin(function (data) {
	console.log(data);
	//=> unicorns
});

$ echo unicorns | node example.js
unicorns

API

stdin(callback)

Get stdin as a string.

stdin.buffer(callback)

Get stdin as a buffer.
